正面情绪是它的能量之源。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
どんなに　たべても　すぐに　おなかが
すく。　でんきで　ローストした
タネを　たいせつに　もちあるく。
flavorText.ko:
아무리 먹어도 금방 배가 고프다.
전기로 구운 씨앗을
소중히 갖고 다닌다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
無論怎麼吃都會馬上肚子餓。
十分珍愛自己用電烘烤過的
種子，隨時都帶在身上。
flavorText.fr:
Il a beau manger, il a tout le temps faim.
Il a toujours des graines grillées à l’électricité
sur lui.
flavorText.de:
Egal, wie viel es auch frisst, es wird sofort wieder
hungrig. Es röstet Samen mit seiner Elektrizität
und trägt diese dann vorsichtig mit sich herum.
flavorText.es:
Siempre tiene apetito, sin importar lo mucho que
coma. Lleva con sumo cuidado las semillas que
ha tostado con su propia electricidad.
flavorText.it:
Indipendentemente da quanto mangia, è sempre
affamato. Tiene molto ai semi che ha arrostito
con l’elettricità e li porta sempre con sé.
flavorText.en:
It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if
they’re precious treasures. No matter how much
it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
flavorText.ja:
どんなに　食べても　すぐに　お腹が
すく。　電気で　ローストした
タネを　大切に　持ち歩く。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
无论怎么吃都会马上肚子饿。
十分珍爱自己用电烘烤过的
种子，随时都带在身上。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
ちからしごとなら　おまかせ。
どうの　からだは　あめで　さび
あざやかな　みどりに　かわる。
flavorText.ko:
힘쓰는 일에 강하다.
동으로 된 몸체는 비에 녹슬어
선명한 녹색으로 변한다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
擅長需要力氣的工作。
銅質的身體會因雨水而生鏽，
轉變成鮮豔的綠色。
flavorText.fr:
Les travaux physiques, c’est son affaire.
Son corps de cuivre rouille sous la pluie
et prend une vive couleur verte.
flavorText.de:
Harte Knochenarbeit kann man problemlos ihm
überlassen. Sein Körper aus Kupfer rostet im
Regen und nimmt eine leuchtend grüne Farbe an.
flavorText.es:
Realiza tareas que requieren de esfuerzo físico,
es su fuerte. Con la lluvia, su cuerpo de cobre se
oxida y adquiere una tonalidad verde intensa.
flavorText.it:
I lavori pesanti sono il suo pane quotidiano.
Il suo corpo di rame si ossida con la pioggia
colorandosi di un verde intenso.
flavorText.en:
If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon
will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the
rain, turning a vibrant green color.
flavorText.ja:
力仕事なら　お任せ。
銅の　体は　雨で　錆び
鮮やかな　緑に　変わる。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
擅长需要力气的工作。
铜质的身体会因雨水而生锈，
转变成鲜艳的绿色。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
むれを　つくって　くらしている。
はなの　あくりょくは　おおいわも
こなごなに　くだくほど　つよい。
flavorText.ko:
무리를 지어 생활한다.
코의 악력은 큰 바위도
산산이 부술 정도로 강하다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
群居的寶可夢。
鼻子的握力十分強勁，
甚至能把大石頭弄得粉碎。
flavorText.fr:
Ces Pokémon vivent en troupeau.
L’étreinte de leur trompe est si forte qu’elle suffit
à réduire un rocher en poussière.
flavorText.de:
Diese Pokémon leben in Herden. Drücken sie mit
ihren kräftigen Rüsseln zu, können sie selbst
massive Felsen zu Staub zermahlen.
flavorText.es:
Viven en manadas. La fuerza prensil de su trompa
es tan extraordinaria que le permite hacer añicos
incluso grandes rocas.
flavorText.it:
Vive in gruppo. La stretta della sua proboscide
è così forte da mandare in frantumi anche le
rocce più grandi.
flavorText.en:
These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have
incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush
giant rocks into powder.
flavorText.ja:
群れを　つくって　暮らしている。
鼻の　握力は　大岩も
粉々に　砕くほど　強い。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
群居的宝可梦。
鼻子的握力十分强劲，
甚至能把大石头弄得粉碎。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
しっぽの　たくましい　きんにくで
はつでんする。　かはんしんに　くらべ
じょうはんしんが　ちいさすぎる。
flavorText.ko:
꼬리의 억센 근육으로
발전한다. 하반신에 비해
상반신이 너무 작다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
會用尾部結實的肌肉
發電。與下半身相比，
上半身真的太小了。
flavorText.fr:
Il envoie des décharges avec les muscles puissants
de sa queue. La partie supérieure de son corps
est trop petite par rapport à la partie inférieure.
flavorText.de:
Mit den kräftigen Muskeln in seinem Schwanz
erzeugt es Elektrizität. Sein Oberkörper ist im
Vergleich zu seinem Unterkörper zu klein.
flavorText.es:
Produce electricidad con la robusta musculatura
de la cola. El tamaño de la parte superior del
cuerpo palidece en comparación con la inferior.
flavorText.it:
Produce elettricità con i possenti muscoli della
coda. La parte superiore del suo corpo è troppo
piccola se paragonata a quella inferiore.
flavorText.en:
The powerful muscles in its tail generate its
electricity. Compared to its lower body,
its upper half is entirely too small.
flavorText.ja:
しっぽの　たくましい　筋肉で
発電する。　下半身に　くらべ
上半身が　小さすぎる。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
会用尾部结实的肌肉
发电。与下半身相比，
上半身真的太小了。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
こだいの　うみべで　くらし　エサを
からだの　こおりで　ほぞん　できたが
うごきが　にぶいため　ぜつめつした。
flavorText.ko:
고대의 해변에 살며 먹이를
몸의 얼음으로 보존시켰지만
움직임이 둔해 멸종하였다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
曾經生活在古代的海邊，
能用身體的冰來保存食物，
但由於動作太遲緩而滅絕了。
flavorText.fr:
Autrefois, il vivait en bord de mer et conservait
sa nourriture dans la glace de son corps,
mais il s’est éteint, car il avait du mal à se déplacer.
flavorText.de:
In der Urzeit lebte es am Strand und konnte mit
seinem kalten Körper Futter haltbar machen.
Es starb wegen seiner trägen Bewegungen aus.
flavorText.es:
Antiguamente vivía en el mar y usaba el hielo del
cuerpo para conservar los alimentos. Su extrema
lentitud, sin embargo, lo condenó a la extinción.
flavorText.it:
Anticamente viveva in riva al mare conservando
il cibo grazie al ghiaccio del suo corpo, ma si è
estinto a causa della sua estrema lentezza.
flavorText.en:
This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and
was able to preserve food with the ice on its
body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
flavorText.ja:
古代の　海辺で　暮らし　餌を
体の　氷で　保存できたが
動きが　鈍いため　絶滅した。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
曾经生活在古代的海边，
能用身体的冰来保存食物，
但由于动作太迟缓而灭绝了。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
じそく６０キロを　こえる　じまんの
きゃくりょくで　はしれるが
すいちゅうでしか　こきゅうできない。
flavorText.ko:
특유의 다릿심으로 시속 60km
이상으로 달릴 수 있지만
물속에서만 호흡할 수 있다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
雖然能用自豪的腳力
以６０公里的時速奔跑，
但是只能在水中呼吸。
flavorText.fr:
Ses pattes robustes lui permettent de courir
à plus de 60 km/h, mais en revanche, il ne peut
respirer que sous l’eau.
flavorText.de:
Seine außergewöhnlich kräftigen Beine lassen es
zwar über 60 km/h schnell laufen, doch atmen
kann es nur unter Wasser.
flavorText.es:
Exhibe con orgullo su inmensa capacidad motriz,
que le permite superar los 60 km/h, pero solo
puede respirar bajo el agua.
flavorText.it:
Vanta gambe molto potenti che gli permettono
di correre a una velocità superiore a 60 km/h,
ma può respirare solo sott’acqua.
flavorText.en:
Its mighty legs are capable of running at
speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon
can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.
flavorText.ja:
時速６０キロを　超える　自慢の
脚力で　走れるが
水中でしか　呼吸できない。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
虽然能用自豪的脚力
以６０公里的时速奔跑，
但是只能在水中呼吸。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
どんな　こうげきにも　きずつかない
つらのかわを　もつが　こきゅうが
ふじゆうだったため　ぜつめつした。
flavorText.ko:
어떤 공격에도 상처 입지 않는
얼굴 가죽을 가졌지만 호흡이
자유롭지 않았던 탓에 멸종하였다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
面部的皮膚無論受到什麼攻擊
都不會受傷，但由於呼吸起來
不方便而滅絕了。
flavorText.fr:
Aucune attaque ne pouvait égratigner la peau
de son visage, mais il s’est éteint, car il avait
du mal à respirer.
flavorText.de:
Kein Angriff konnte seine Gesichtshaut verletzen,
doch es war in seiner Atmung eingeschränkt und
starb daher aus.
flavorText.es:
Aunque la piel de su rostro era capaz de resistir
cualquier ataque, su dificultad para respirar
acabó provocando su extinción.
flavorText.it:
Nessun attacco poteva scalfire la pelle del suo
muso, ma si è estinto perché aveva difficoltà
a respirare.
flavorText.en:
The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but
breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go
extinct anyway.
flavorText.ja:
どんな　攻撃にも　傷つかない
面の皮を　もつが　呼吸が
不自由だったため　絶滅した。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
面部的皮肤无论受到什么攻击
都不会受伤，但由于呼吸起来
不方便而灭绝了。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
とくしゅな　きんぞくの　からだは
かるく　みのこなしは　ばつぐん。
あめが　にがてで　どうくつに　すむ。
flavorText.ko:
금속으로 된 특수한 몸은
가벼워서 몸놀림이 뛰어나다.
비를 싫어해 동굴에 산다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
由特殊金屬構成的身體
十分輕盈，能夠靈活地活動。
不喜歡下雨，所以住在洞窟裡。
flavorText.fr:
Son corps, composé d’un métal spécial, est léger
et lui offre une excellente mobilité. Il est toutefois
sensible à la pluie et vit donc dans les grottes.
flavorText.de:
Es ist sehr beweglich, weil sein Körper aus einem
speziellen, leichten Metall besteht. Da es Regen
nicht mag, lebt es in Höhlen.
flavorText.es:
Hace gala de una agilidad extraordinaria, ya que
su cuerpo está compuesto de un metal especial.
Detesta la lluvia, por lo que habita en cuevas.
flavorText.it:
Il suo corpo fatto di un metallo speciale è
leggero e gli conferisce un’andatura impeccabile.
Vive nelle grotte perché odia la pioggia.
flavorText.en:
The special metal that composes its body is very
light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility.
It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
flavorText.ja:
特殊な　金属の　体は
軽く　身のこなしは　抜群。
雨が　苦手で　洞窟に　棲む。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
由特殊金属构成的身体
十分轻盈，能够灵活地活动。
不喜欢下雨，所以住在洞窟里。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
１ぴきでは　こどもにも　まけるくらい
ひりきだが　なかまの　きょうりょくで
きたえられ　しんかして　つよくなる。
flavorText.ko:
1마리로는 아이에게도 질 정도로
힘이 약하지만 동료의 협력으로
단련하고 진화하면 강해진다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
雖然單獨１隻弱得甚至敵不過小孩，
但會和夥伴合作一起鍛鍊，
透過進化而變得更強。
flavorText.fr:
Seul, il est si faible qu’il ne saurait rivaliser avec
un enfant, mais en coopérant avec ses semblables,
il peut devenir assez fort pour évoluer.
flavorText.de:
Alleine ist es sogar gegen ein Kind machtlos,
doch mit der Hilfe seiner Gefährten trainiert es,
entwickelt sich und wird so stärker.
flavorText.es:
En solitario es tan débil que no sería rival ni para
un niño, pero, al entrenarse con sus congéneres,
evoluciona y se vuelve más fuerte.
flavorText.it:
Da solo è più debole di un bambino, ma se
si allena con l’aiuto dei suoi simili si evolve
e diventa più forte.
flavorText.en:
If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child
could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help
it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
flavorText.ja:
１匹では　子どもにも　負けるくらい
非力だが　仲間の　協力で
鍛えられ　進化して　強くなる。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
虽然单独１只弱得甚至敌不过小孩，
但会和伙伴合作一起锻炼，
通过进化而变得更强。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
せわをする　ドラメシヤを　あたまに
のせていないと　おちつかないので
ほかの　ポケモンを　のせようとする。
flavorText.ko:
보살피는 드라꼰을 머리에
태우지 않으면 진정하지 못하고
다른 포켓몬을 태우려고 한다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
要是沒讓自己在照顧的多龍梅西亞
乘在頭上就靜不下心來，甚至會
因此試圖把別的寶可夢放到頭上。
flavorText.fr:
Il prend soin du Fantyrm sur sa tête.
Quand ce dernier n’est plus là, il panique
et tente de le remplacer par un autre Pokémon.
flavorText.de:
Hat es kein Grolldra auf seinem Kopf, auf das es
aufpassen kann, wird es nervös. Dann versucht es,
ein anderes Pokémon auf seinen Kopf zu setzen.
flavorText.es:
Si no lleva un Dreepy del que cuidar encima de
la cabeza, se intranquiliza y trata de sustituirlo
con otro Pokémon.
flavorText.it:
Se non ha un Dreepy sulla testa di cui prendersi
cura, non riesce a stare tranquillo e cerca
di sostituirlo con altri Pokémon.
flavorText.en:
Without a Dreepy to place on its head and
care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute
any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
flavorText.ja:
世話をする　ドラメシヤを　頭に
乗せていないと　落ち着かないので
ほかの　ポケモンを　乗せようとする。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
要是没让自己在照顾的多龙梅西亚
乘在头上就静不下心来，甚至会
因此试图把别的宝可梦放到头上。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
ツノに　はいった　ドラメシヤは
マッハの　スピードで　とばされるのを
こころまちに　しているらしい。
flavorText.ko:
뿔에 들어간 드라꼰은
마하의 속도로 날려지기를
기대하고 있는 것 같다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
牠角裡的多龍梅西亞
似乎滿心期待著能被
以音速發射出去。
flavorText.fr:
Il paraît que les Fantyrm installés dans ses cornes
attendent impatiemment le moment où ils seront
propulsés à la vitesse du son.
flavorText.de:
Die Grolldra, die in seinen Hörnern sitzen,
warten angeblich voller Spannung darauf, mit
Mach-Geschwindigkeit abgefeuert zu werden.
flavorText.es:
Al parecer, los Dreepy que residen en sus
cuernos esperan con ilusión el momento de ser
propulsados a velocidad supersónica.
flavorText.it:
I Dreepy che vivono nelle sue corna attendono
ansiosamente di essere sparati alla velocità
del suono.
flavorText.en:
Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s
horns eagerly look forward to being launched out
at Mach speeds.
flavorText.ja:
ツノに　入った　ドラメシヤは
マッハの　スピードで　飛ばされるのを
心待ちに　しているらしい。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
它角里的多龙梅西亚
似乎满心期待着能被
以音速发射出去。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
ながい　ねむりに　ついていた
ザマゼンタの　あね　とも
ライバルとも　いわれる　ポケモン。
flavorText.ko:
오랜 세월 잠들어 있던
자마젠타의 형제자매 또는
라이벌로 불리는 포켓몬이다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
這隻寶可夢被認為是沉睡已久的
藏瑪然特的姐姐，也有人
認為牠們之間是勁敵關係。
flavorText.fr:
On dit qu’il s’agit de la figure fraternelle
et du rival de Zamazenta, un Pokémon plongé
dans un long sommeil.
flavorText.de:
Man sagt, es sei wie ein älteres Geschwisterteil,
aber auch wie ein Rivale zu Zamazenta, welches
in einen langen Schlaf gefallen war.
flavorText.es:
Hay quien lo considera una suerte de figura
fraterna a la par que rival de Zamazenta,
un Pokémon sumido en un profundo letargo.
flavorText.it:
Viene considerato una figura fraterna e allo
stesso tempo un rivale per Zamazenta,
un Pokémon rimasto a lungo addormentato.
flavorText.en:
This Pokémon has slumbered for many years.
Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others
say the two Pokémon are rivals.
flavorText.ja:
長い　眠りに　ついていた
ザマゼンタの　姉　とも
ライバルとも　いわれる　ポケモン。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
这只宝可梦被认为是沉睡已久的
藏玛然特的姐姐，也有人
认为它们之间是劲敌关系。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
せきぞうの　ような　すがたで
わすれさられるほどの　あいだ
ねむりに　ついていた　ポケモン。
flavorText.ko:
석상 같은 모습으로
잊혀질 정도의 세월 동안
잠들어 있던 포켓몬이다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
以石像般的姿態陷入
長久沉眠的寶可夢。
幾乎就要被人們所遺忘。
flavorText.fr:
Ce Pokémon, changé en statue, est resté pétrifié
si longtemps qu’il a failli tomber dans l’oubli.
flavorText.de:
Dieses Pokémon fiel in Form einer Steinstatue
in solch einen langen Schlaf, dass es in
Vergessenheit geraten ist.
flavorText.es:
Con la apariencia de una estatua de piedra, este
Pokémon se sumió en un letargo tan profundo
que acabó cayendo en el olvido.
flavorText.it:
Questo Pokémon è rimasto addormentato sotto
forma di statua così a lungo da venire
completamente dimenticato.
flavorText.en:
This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of
a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot
that it ever existed.
flavorText.ja:
石像の　ような　姿で
忘れ去られるほどの　あいだ
眠りに　ついていた　ポケモン。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
以石像般的姿态陷入
长久沉眠的宝可梦。
几乎就要被人们所遗忘。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
２まんねんまえに　おちた　いんせきの
なかに　いた。　ダイマックスの
なぞに　かんけいしている　らしい。
flavorText.ko:
2만 년 전에 떨어진 운석
안에 있었다. 다이맥스의
수수께끼와 관련이 있는 듯하다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
來自於２萬年前墜落
到地上的隕石之中。
似乎與極巨化之謎有所關聯。
flavorText.fr:
Il se trouvait dans une météorite qui s’est écrasée
il y a 20 000 ans. Il semble y avoir un lien
entre ce Pokémon et le phénomène Dynamax.
flavorText.de:
Es steckte in einem Meteorit, der vor 20 000
Jahren herabstürzte. Es scheint in Verbindung
mit dem Dynamax-Phänomen zu stehen.
flavorText.es:
Fue hallado en el interior de un meteorito caído
hace 20 000 años. Por lo visto, está relacionado
con el misterio que rodea al fenómeno Dinamax.
flavorText.it:
È giunto dallo spazio dentro un meteorite caduto
20.000 anni fa. Sembra essere in qualche modo
collegato al mistero del fenomeno Dynamax.
flavorText.en:
It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years
ago. There seems to be a connection between
this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
flavorText.ja:
２万年前に　落ちた　隕石の
中に　いた。　ダイマックスの
謎に　関係している　らしい。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
来自于２万年前坠落
到地上的陨石之中。
似乎与极巨化之谜有所关联。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
あたまの　しろく　ながい　たいもうを
ひっぱると　きあいが　たかまり
たんでんから　パワーが　わきあがる。
flavorText.ko:
머리의 하얗고 긴 털을
잡아당기면 기세가 고조되어
단전에서 파워가 끓어오른다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
拉緊頭上又白又長的體毛
就會變得氣勢高昂，
並且由丹田湧出力量。
flavorText.fr:
Lorsqu’il tire sur les longs poils blancs
sur sa tête, il devient plus combatif et
de l’énergie jaillit de sous son nombril.
flavorText.de:
Zieht es an dem langen weißen Fell an seinem
Hinterkopf, steigert das seinen Kampfgeist und
aus seiner Körpermitte steigt Kraft empor.
flavorText.es:
Al tirar de los mechones blancos de la cabeza,
acrecienta su espíritu luchador y empieza a
acumular fuerza en el órgano de su bajo vientre.
flavorText.it:
Tira i lunghi ciuffi di pelo bianco che ha sulla
testa per incrementare il suo spirito combattivo,
facendo sgorgare energia dal ventre.
flavorText.en:
If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head,
its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up
from the depths of its belly.
flavorText.ja:
頭の　白く　長い　体毛を
引っぱると　気合が　高まり
丹田から　パワーが　湧きあがる。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
拉紧头上又白又长的体毛，
就会变得斗气势高昂，
并从丹田涌出力量。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
とおい　ちほうの　さんがくちたいで
くらす。　だんがいぜっぺきを　はしり
あしこしを　きたえ　わざを　みがく。
flavorText.ko:
먼 지방의 산악지대에 산다.
낭떠러지 절벽을 달리며
하체를 단련하고 기술을 연마한다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
棲息在遙遠地區的山岳地帶。
會在斷崖絕壁上來回奔跑
鍛鍊下盤，磨練招式。
flavorText.fr:
Il vit dans une lointaine région montagneuse où
il peaufine ses techniques et muscle ses jambes
en courant le long des falaises abruptes.
flavorText.de:
Wulaosu lebt in den Bergen einer fernen Region.
Um die Beine zu stählen und seine Kampftechnik
zu verbessern, rennt es steile Klippen entlang.
flavorText.es:
Vive en zonas montañosas en áreas recónditas,
donde entrena corriendo por escarpados riscos
para fortalecer sus piernas y refinar su técnica.
flavorText.it:
Vive nelle zone montuose di una regione lontana.
Corre sulle pareti dei dirupi, allenando gli arti
inferiori e perfezionando le sue mosse.
flavorText.en:
Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this
Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs
and refining its moves.
flavorText.ja:
遠い　地方の　山岳地帯で
暮らす。　断崖絶壁を　走り
足腰を　鍛え　技を　磨く。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
生活在遥远地区的山岳地带。
通过在断崖绝壁上奔跑
来锻炼腰腿，磨炼招式。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
からだに　はえる　ツルは　ちぎれると
つちの　えいようぶんとなって　もりの
しょくぶつたちを　そだてるのだ。
flavorText.ko:
몸에 난 덩굴이 끊어지면
토양에 영양분이 되어
숲의 식물들을 성장시킨다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
生長在身上的藤蔓斷落後
會化為土壤的養分，
孕育森林裡的各種植物。
flavorText.fr:
Lorsque ses lianes se détachent de son corps,
elles fertilisent le sol et favorisent la croissance
des plantes de la forêt.
flavorText.de:
Reißen die an seinem Körper wachsenden Ranken
ab, werden sie zu Nährstoffen für den Boden,
was den Pflanzen im Wald zum Wachstum verhilft.
flavorText.es:
Las lianas que le brotan del cuerpo nutren y
fertilizan el mantillo del bosque cuando se le
desprenden.
flavorText.it:
Se si staccano, le liane del suo corpo diventano
nutrimento per il suolo, favorendo lo sviluppo
delle piante della foresta.
flavorText.en:
Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they
become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants
of the forest grow.
flavorText.ja:
体に　生える　ツルは　ちぎれると
土の　栄養分となって　森の
植物たちを　育てるのだ。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
长在身上的藤蔓断掉之后
会变成土壤的养分，
帮助森林中的植物成长。

genus.ja-Hrkt: エレクトロンポケモン
genus.ja: エレクトロンポケモン

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
ぜんしんが　でんきエネルギーを
つくる　きかん。　ガラルぜんどの
でんきを　つくりだすことができる。
flavorText.ko:
온몸이 전기 에너지를 만드는 기관이다.
가라르 전 지역에서 사용하는 양의
전기를 만들어 낼 수 있다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
全身都是能發電的器官。
牠製造的電能可以滿足
伽勒爾全域的電力需求。
flavorText.fr:
Son corps est entièrement composé d’organes
générant de l’électricité. Il peut produire
assez d’énergie pour alimenter tout Galar.
flavorText.de:
Sein Körper besteht aus einem Organ, das
elektrische Energie erzeugt. Regieleki kann genug
Strom produzieren, um ganz Galar zu versorgen.
flavorText.es:
Todo su cuerpo es un órgano electrógeno, cuya
potencia sería suficiente para abastecer la región
de Galar por completo.
flavorText.it:
Il suo corpo è costituito interamente da un
organo che produce energia elettrica.
Fornisce corrente all’intera regione di Galar.
flavorText.en:
Its entire body is made up of a single organ that
generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable
of creating all Galar’s electricity.
flavorText.ja:
全身が　電気エネルギーを
作る　器官。　ガラル全土の
電気を　作りだすことができる。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
整个身体是制造电能的
器官。可以制造出
伽勒尔全域所需的电力。

genus.ja-Hrkt: りゅうぎょくポケモン
genus.ja: りゅうぎょくポケモン

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
ぜんしんが　ドラゴンエネルギーの
けっしょう。　すべての　ドラゴン
ポケモンの　ちからを　もつらしい。
flavorText.ko:
온몸이 드래곤 에너지의
결정체다. 모든 드래곤포켓몬의
힘을 가지고 있는 듯하다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
全身是由龍之能量的結晶
打造而成。據說牠擁有
所有的龍寶可夢的力量。
flavorText.fr:
Son corps est entièrement composé de cristaux
d’énergie draconique. Il possèderait les pouvoirs
de tous les Pokémon Dragon.
flavorText.de:
Sein ganzer Körper besteht aus kristallisierter
Drachen-Energie. Es soll über die Kräfte aller
Drachen-Pokémon verfügen.
flavorText.es:
Todo su cuerpo es una gema de energía dragón
cristalizada. Se cree que posee los poderes de
todos los Pokémon dragón.
flavorText.it:
Il suo corpo è formato da energia Drago
cristallizzata. Pare che possieda i poteri
di tutti i Pokémon di tipo Drago.
flavorText.en:
Its body is composed of crystallized dragon
energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of
every dragon Pokémon.
flavorText.ja:
全身が　ドラゴンエネルギーの
結晶。　すべての　ドラゴン
ポケモンの　力を　持つらしい。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
整个身体是龙之能量的
结晶。据说它拥有
所有龙宝可梦的能力。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
すさまじい　かいりきの　もちぬし。
かおを　おおう　こおりの　マスクは
ダイヤモンドの　１００ばい　かたい。
flavorText.ko:
굉장한 괴력을 가졌다.
얼굴을 덮는 얼음 마스크는
다이아몬드보다 100배 단단하다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
擁有十分驚人的怪力。
遮住臉部的冰面罩比
鑽石還要堅硬１００倍。
flavorText.fr:
Ce Pokémon à la force hors du commun porte
un masque composé de glace cent fois plus
solide que le diamant.
flavorText.de:
Das Gesicht dieses außergewöhnlich starken
Pokémon wird von einer Maske aus Eis bedeckt,
die hundertmal härter als Diamant ist.
flavorText.es:
Cuenta con una fuerza física sobrecogedora.
La máscara de hielo que le cubre el rostro es
cien veces más dura que el diamante.
flavorText.it:
È dotato di una forza incommensurabile.
La maschera di ghiaccio che gli ricopre il muso
è cento volte più dura del diamante.
flavorText.en:
Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and
the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times
harder than diamond.
flavorText.ja:
凄まじい　怪力の　持ち主。
顔を　覆う　氷の　マスクは
ダイヤモンドの　１００倍　硬い。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
拥有十分惊人的怪力。
戴在脸上的冰之面罩
硬度是钻石的１００倍

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
やみよを　かけぬけ　ねているものの
せいめいエネルギーを　すいとる。
こどくと　せいじゃくを　このむ。
flavorText.ko:
어두운 밤을 달리며 잠든 자의
생명 에너지를 흡수한다.
고독과 정적을 좋아한다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
在漆黑的夜裡奔馳，吸取
正在睡覺的生物的生命能量。
喜愛孤獨與寂靜。
flavorText.fr:
Ce Pokémon friand de silence et de solitude
galope à travers les ténèbres nocturnes
et aspire l’énergie vitale des êtres endormis.
flavorText.de:
Es galoppiert durch die finstere Nacht und
absorbiert die Lebensenergie der Schlafenden.
Phantoross bevorzugt Einsamkeit und Stille.
flavorText.es:
Amante de la quietud y la soledad, galopa por
las tinieblas nocturnas absorbiendo la energía
vital de toda criatura que esté durmiendo.
flavorText.it:
Galoppa nelle notti buie assorbendo l’energia
vitale delle creature addormentate.
Ama la solitudine e la quiete.
flavorText.en:
As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs
the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves
silence and solitude.
flavorText.ja:
闇夜を　駆けぬけ　寝ているものの
生命エネルギーを　吸い取る。
孤独と　静寂を　好む。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
在黑暗的夜晚中奔跑，吸取
正在睡觉的生物的生命能量。
喜欢孤独和静寂。

flavorText.ja-Hrkt:
おおむかしの　ガラルを　すべていた
でんせつの　おう。　こころを　いやし
くさきを　めぶかせる　ちからがある。
flavorText.ko:
먼 옛날 가라르를 지배했던
전설의 왕. 마음을 치유하고
초목을 싹 트게 하는 능력이 있다.
flavorText.zh-Hant:
曾在很久以前統治伽勒爾的
傳說之王。擁有治癒心靈，
讓草木發芽的力量。
flavorText.fr:
Ce roi légendaire qui a régné sur Galar il y a fort
longtemps possède le pouvoir d’apaiser les cœurs
et de faire germer les plantes.
flavorText.de:
Ein legendärer König, der einst Galar regierte.
Coronospa besitzt die Macht, Herzen zu
besänftigen und Pflanzen gedeihen zu lassen.
flavorText.es:
Legendario monarca del antiguo Galar. Posee el
poder de sanar el espíritu y de hacer brotar la
vegetación.
flavorText.it:
Il re delle leggende che dominò su Galar in un
lontano passato. È in grado di calmare gli animi
e far germogliare la vegetazione.
flavorText.en:
Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled
over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to
cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
flavorText.ja:
大昔の　ガラルを　統べていた
伝説の　王。　心を　癒し
草木を　芽吹かせる　力がある。
flavorText.zh-Hans:
曾经在很久以前统治着
伽勒尔的传说之王。拥有
治愈心灵和让草木发芽的能力。

flavorText.en:
The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is
erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains
heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes
and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon
this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.

Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before
fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species
throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.

genus.ja-Hrkt: クライミングポケモン
genus.ja: クライミングポケモン

flavorText.en:
Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical
prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen
highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the
nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter
comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love
gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
The sweet scent its body gives off mesmerizes those around it. The scent grows stronger when this Pokémon is in the sun.
The hardness of Floragato’s fur depends on the Pokémon’s mood. When Floragato is prepared to battle, its fur becomes pointed and needle sharp.
With skillful misdirection, it rigs foes with pollen-packed flower bombs. Meowscarada sets off the bombs before its foes realize what’s going on.
Its flame sac is small, so energy is always leaking out. This energy is released from the dent atop Fuecoco’s head and flickers to and fro.
The valve in Crocalor’s flame sac is closely connected to its vocal cords. This Pokémon utters a guttural cry as it spews flames every which way.
Skeledirge’s gentle singing soothes the souls of all that hear it. It burns its enemies to a crisp with flames of over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit.
Its strong legs let it easily swim around in even fast-flowing rivers. It likes to keep things tidy and is prone to overthinking things.
The hardworking Quaxwell observes people and Pokémon from various regions and incorporates their movements into its own dance routines.
Dancing in ways that evoke far-away places, this Pokémon mesmerizes all that see it. Flourishes of its decorative water feathers slice into its foes.
This Pokémon spurns all but the finest of foods. Its body gives off an herblike scent that bug Pokémon detest.
It entrances female Pokémon with the sweet, alluring scent that wafts from all over its body.
The thread it secretes from its rear is as strong as wire. The secret behind the thread’s strength is the topic of ongoing research.
Spidops covers its territory in tough, sticky threads to set up traps for intruders.
It’s highly skilled at a fighting style in which it uses its jumping capabilities to dodge incoming attacks while also dealing damage to opponents.
It uses its normally folded third set of legs when in Showdown Mode. This places a huge burden on its body, so it can’t stay in this mode for long.
The pads of its paws are electricity-discharging organs. Pawmi fires electricity from its forepaws while standing unsteadily on its hind legs.
Pawmo uses a unique fighting technique in which it uses its forepaws to strike foes and zap them with electricity from its paw pads simultaneously.
Pawmot’s fluffy fur acts as a battery. It can store the same amount of electricity as an electric car.
The pair sticks together no matter what. They split any food they find exactly in half and then eat it together.
The larger pair protects the little ones during battles. When facing strong opponents, the whole group will join the fight.
The yeast in Fidough’s breath is useful for cooking, so this Pokémon has been protected by people since long ago.
The surface of this Pokémon’s skin hardens when exposed to intense heat, and its body has an appetizing aroma.
This Pokémon converts nutrients into oil, which it stores in the fruit on its head. It can easily go a whole week without eating or drinking.
It basks in the sun to its heart’s content until the fruits on its head ripen. After that, Dolliv departs from human settlements and goes on a journey.
This Pokémon drives back enemies by launching its rich, aromatic oil at them with enough force to smash a boulder.
Green-feathered flocks hold the most sway. When they’re out searching for food in the mornings and evenings, it gets very noisy.
The ground scrapes its body as it travels, causing it to leave salt behind. Salt is constantly being created and replenished inside Nacli’s body.
It compresses rock salt inside its body and shoots out hardened salt pellets with enough force to perforate an iron sheet.
Many Pokémon gather around Garganacl, hoping to lick at its mineral-rich salt.
Its firepower increases when it fights, reaching over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. It likes berries that are rich in fat.
This Pokémon clads itself in armor that has been fortified by psychic and fire energy, and it shoots blazing fireballs.
An old set of armor steeped in grudges caused this Pokémon’s evolution. Ceruledge cuts its enemies to pieces without mercy.

genus.ja-Hrkt: でんきおたまポケモン

flavorText.en: It floats using the electricity stored in its body. When thunderclouds are around, Tadbulb will float higher off the ground.

genus.ja-Hrkt: でんきがえるポケモン

flavorText.en: What appear to be eyeballs are actually organs for discharging the electricity generated by Bellibolt’s belly-button dynamo.
These Pokémon make their nests on coastal cliffs. The nests have a strange, crackling texture, and they’re a popular delicacy.

genus.ja-Hrkt: ぐんかんどりポケモン

flavorText.en: It uses its throat sac to store electricity generated by its wings. There’s hardly any oil in its feathers, so it is a poor swimmer.
Its well-developed jaw and fangs are strong enough to crunch through boulders, and its thick fat makes for an excellent defense.
Mabosstiff loves playing with children. Though usually gentle, it takes on an intimidating look when protecting its family.
To keep enemies away from its territory, it paints markings around its nest using a poisonous liquid that has an acrid odor.
Each Grafaiai paints its own individual pattern, and it will paint that same pattern over and over again throughout its life.

genus.ja-Hrkt: ころがりぐさポケモン

flavorText.en: Not even Bramblin knows where it is headed as it tumbles across the wilderness, blown by the wind. It loathes getting wet.

genus.ja-Hrkt: ころがりぐさポケモン

flavorText.en: Brambleghast wanders around arid regions. On rare occasions, mass outbreaks of these Pokémon will bury an entire town.
Though it looks like Tentacool, Toedscool is a completely different species. Its legs may be thin, but it can run at a speed of 30 mph.
It coils its 10 tentacles around prey and sucks out their nutrients, causing the prey pain. The folds along the rim of its head are a popular delicacy.
This Pokémon lives on sheer cliffs. It sidesteps opponents’ attacks, then lunges for their weak spots with its claws.
Traditional Paldean dishes can be extremely spicy because they include the shed front teeth of Capsakid among their ingredients.
The green head has turned vicious due to the spicy chemicals stimulating its brain. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
It rolls its mud ball around while the energy it needs for evolution matures. Eventually the time comes for it to evolve.
An infant sleeps inside the ball. Rabsca rolls the ball soothingly with its legs to ensure the infant sleeps comfortably.
It spends its time running around wastelands. If anyone steals its beloved berries, it will chase them down and exact its revenge.
It emits psychic power from the gaps between its multicolored frills and sprints at speeds greater than 120 mph.
This Pokémon pounds iron scraps together to make a hammer. It will remake the hammer again and again until it’s satisfied with the result.
These Pokémon make their homes in piles of scrap metal. They test the strength of each other’s hammers by smashing them together.
The hammer tops 220 pounds, yet it gets swung around easily by Tinkaton as it steals whatever it pleases and carries its plunder back home.
Though it looks like Diglett, Wiglett is an entirely different species. The resemblance seems to be a coincidental result of environmental adaptation.
A variety of fish Pokémon, Wugtrio was once considered to be a regional form of Dugtrio.
Bombirdier uses the apron on its chest to bundle up food, which it carries back to its nest. It enjoys dropping things that make loud noises.
Its water ring is made from seawater mixed with a sticky fluid that Finizen secretes from its blowhole.
Its physical capabilities are no different than a Finizen’s, but when its allies are in danger, it transforms and powers itself up.
The steel section is Varoom’s actual body. This Pokémon clings to rocks and converts the minerals within into energy to fuel its activities.
Revavroom viciously threatens others with the sound of its exhaust. It sticks its tongue out from its cylindrical mouth and sprays toxic fluids.
It can sprint at over 70 mph while carrying a human. The rider’s body heat warms Cyclizar’s back and lifts the Pokémon’s spirit.
This Pokémon lives in arid deserts. It maintains its metal body by consuming iron from the soil.
Glimmet’s toxic mineral crystals look just like flower petals. This Pokémon scatters poisonous powder like pollen to protect itself.
Glimmora’s petals are made of crystallized poison energy. It has recently become evident that these petals resemble Tera Jewels.
This friendly Pokémon doesn’t like being alone. Pay it even the slightest bit of attention, and it will follow you forever.
A lovingly mourned Pokémon was reborn as Houndstone. It doesn’t like anyone touching the protuberance atop its head.
Thanks to a behavior of theirs known as “synchronizing,” an entire flock of these Pokémon can attack simultaneously in perfect harmony.
It lives in frigid regions in pods of five or so individuals. It loves the minerals found in snow and ice.
Ice energy builds up in the horn on its upper jaw, causing the horn to reach cryogenic temperatures that freeze its surroundings.
Veluza has excellent regenerative capabilities. It sheds spare flesh from its body to boost its agility, then charges at its prey.
It treats Tatsugiri like its boss and follows it loyally. Though powerful, Dondozo is apparently not very smart.
Tatsugiri is an extremely cunning Pokémon. It feigns weakness to lure in prey, then orders its partner to attack.
It imbues its fists with the power of the rage that it kept hidden in its heart. Opponents struck by these imbued fists will be shattered to their core.
It lives at the bottom of ponds and swamps. It will carry Wooper on its back and ferry them across water from one shore to the other.
The hardened head from the tail protects the head of the main body as Farigiraf whips its long neck around to headbutt enemies.
It drives enemies out of its nest by sucking in enough air to fill its long, narrow lungs, then releasing the air in an intense blast.
Though it commands a massive army in battle, it’s not skilled at devising complex strategies. It just uses brute strength to keep pushing.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: This creature resembles a mysterious Pokémon that, according to a paranormal magazine, has lived since ancient times.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It resembles a mysterious Pokémon described in a paranormal magazine as a Jigglypuff from one billion years ago.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It bears a slight resemblance to a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a cross between a dinosaur and a mushroom.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It has similar features to a ghostly pterosaur that was covered in a paranormal magazine, but the two have little else in common.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: This Pokémon somewhat resembles an ancient form of Volcarona that was introduced in a dubious magazine.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It slightly resembles a Magneton that lived for 10,000 years and was featured in an article in a paranormal magazine.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. It resembles a mysterious object described in an old expedition journal.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokémon.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: This Pokémon shares many similarities with Iron Hands, an object mentioned in a certain expedition journal.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It’s possible that Iron Jugulis, an object described in an old book, may actually be this Pokémon.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: No records exist of this species being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with an object described in an old book.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: Some of its notable features match those of an object named within a certain expedition journal as Iron Thorns.
This Pokémon lives in forests and craggy areas. Using the power of its dorsal fin, it cools the inside of its nest like a refrigerator.
It attacks with the blade of its frozen dorsal fin by doing a front flip in the air. Arctibax’s strong back and legs allow it to pull off this technique.

genus.ja-Hrkt: ひょうりゅうポケモン

flavorText.en: It launches itself into battle by flipping upside down and spewing frigid air from its mouth. It finishes opponents off with its dorsal blade.
It lives inside an old treasure chest. Sometimes it gets left in shop corners since no one realizes it’s actually a Pokémon.
It has a sturdy body made up of stacked coins. Gholdengo overwhelms its enemies by firing coin after coin at them in quick succession.
It drains the life-force from vegetation, causing nearby forests to instantly wither and fields to turn barren.
The hatred of those who perished by the sword long ago has clad itself in snow and become a Pokémon.
It slowly brings its exceedingly heavy head down upon the ground, splitting the earth open with huge fissures that run over 160 feet deep.
The envy accumulated within curved beads that sparked multiple conflicts has clad itself in fire and become a Pokémon.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: According to an article in a dubious magazine, this Pokémon has some connection to a phenomenon that occurs in a certain region.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: It’s possible that this is the object listed as Iron Valiant in a certain expedition journal.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: This Pokémon resembles Cyclizar, but it is far burlier and more ferocious. Nothing is known about its ecology or other features.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン

flavorText.en: This seems to be the Iron Serpent mentioned in an old book. The Iron Serpent is said to have turned the land to ash with its lightning.

genus.ja-Hrkt: パラドックスポケモン
パラドックスポケモン
